synopsis.text: He eding his grandfather's final wish, Mizuho, a sports-loving boy, finds himself navigating the uncharted territory of an all-girls academy, the same one his mother attended. With the aid of his childhood friend Mariya, Mizuho undergoes a transformation, convincingly masquerading as a female student. The academy presents a series of challenges, from mastering feminine language and behaviors to maintaining his disguise among his peers. Alongside Mariya, Mizuho befriends and mentors two younger students, Yukari and Kana, and encounters Takako, a rival from Mariya's past. The stakes rise as Mizuho becomes an unexpected contender in the school's prestigious election. Will Mizuho's natural charm and a dash of luck help him fulfill his grandfather's wish and graduate from the academy without revealing his true identity?
